verbs.description: President Donald Trump [V: is] reportedly using his cell phone more often lately , largely to spite chief of staff John Kelly . He is n’t informing Kelly of the calls he ’s taking , and is essentially acting as his own chief of staff .

[ARG0: President Donald Trump] is [ARGM-ADV: reportedly] [V: using] [ARG1: his cell phone] [ARGM-TMP: more often] [ARGM-TMP: lately] , [ARGM-PRP: largely to spite chief of staff John Kelly] . He is n’t informing Kelly of the calls he ’s taking , and is essentially acting as his own chief of staff .
